hsv1 genitally doesn't reoccur that often. we don't even recommend suppressive therapy for it. About half of folks never get another recurrence. Of those who do, the average is 1 additional ob the first year and then 1 ob every other year.http://www.ashastd.org/std-sti-works/Herpes/oral-herpes.html  has terrific information on oral herpes. perhaps your spouse reading that will better convince him that symptoms don't have to be present to be shedding the virus actively and transmit it to a partner either orally or genitally.
